Section.Header: American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) Temperature

Object.Text: These figures represent time series compare simulated and observed temperature from January through December to aid calibration. Time (date) is represented on the x-axis and temperature (%%degrees%%F) is represented on the y-axis. Four lines are included in the figure: observed (light blue) and simulated (red-dashed) hourly water temperature and observed (dark blue) and simulated (dark red dashed) daily average water temperature.

Object.Title: %%region%%, Simulation: %%SimulationName%% %%year%%
Object.Description: American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) temperature, %%year%%. ResSim.

American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) temperature, annual performance statistics, shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (mean bias: +/- 1.35%%units%%, MAE: %%gt%%1.80%%units%%, RMSE: %%gt%%2.70%%units%%, NSE: %%lt%%0.65). ResSim.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) temperature, monthly means (%%units%%) and counts. ResSim.

American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) temperature, monthly average mean bias (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (+/- 1.35%%units%%). CE-QUAL-W2.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) temperature, monthly average MAE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%gt%%1.80%%units%%). ResSim.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) temperature, monthly average RMSE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%gt%%2.70%%units%%). ResSim.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) temperature, monthly average NSE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%lt%%0.65). ResSim.

Section.Header: American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) Flow

Object.Text: River flow figures compare simulated and observed flow time series from January through December to aid calibration. Time (date) is represented on the x-axis and flow (cfs) is represented on the y-axis. Four lines are included in the figures: observed (light blue) and simulated (red-dashed) hourly flow and observed (dark blue) and simulated (dark red dashed) daily average flow. In certain instances, time series for multiple years are shown to indicate comparison of observed data and model simulations for longer time periods.

Object.Title: %%region%%, Simulation: %%SimulationName%% %%year%%
Object.Description: American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) hourly flow, %%year%%. ResSim.

American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) hourly flow, annual performance statistics, shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (mean bias: +/- 150 %%units%%, MAE: %%gt%%300 %%units%%, RMSE: %%gt%%500 %%units%%, NSE: %%lt%%0.65). ResSim.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) hourly flow, monthly means (%%units%%) and counts. ResSim.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) hourly flow, monthly average mean bias (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (+/- 150 %%units%%). ResSim.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) hourly flow, monthly average MAE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%gt%%300 %%units%%). CE-QUAL-W2.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) hourly flow, monthly average RMSE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%gt%%500 %%units%%). ResSim.
American River at Fair Oaks (AFO) hourly flow, monthly average NSE, shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%lt%%0.65). CE-QUAL-W2.
